name: Cookie Clone Factory
description:
Welcome to the magnificent Cookie Clone Factory! 

Help us to fulfill orders by cloning cookies or releasing the cookie monster.
The factory's owner, Chef, will guide you to multiply, divide and learn all the basics of place value and the base 10 system.

Instructions

During the first part, you'll help Chef by showing how different cookie package sizes relate. This is done by dragging answers into answer slots, which the board will verify.

After this part has been completed, it's time to work the production line. Operate on batches of cookie packages to fulfill specific orders by multiplying or dividing by factors of 10.

The final part will combine all learned lessons. Answer questions while taking multiplication, division and package sizes into account.

Have fun!
